name: Invesco S&P High Yield Low Volatility Corporate Bond ETF
description: The Invesco S&P High Yield Low Volatility Corporate Bond ETF (HYLB) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investors with exposure to the performance of high yield corporate bonds while minimizing volatility. Launched in 2016, HYLB seeks to track the investment results of the S&P High Yield Low Volatility Corporate Bond Index, which consists of U.S. dollar-denominated, high yield corporate bonds that exhibit low volatility characteristics. This ETF is designed for investors looking for a balance between yield and risk, making it an attractive option for those seeking income generation with a lower risk profile compared to traditional high yield bond investments. The fund’s portfolio includes a diverse mix of sectors such as technology, healthcare, consumer goods, and energy, providing broad exposure to the high yield market. By focusing on low volatility bonds, HYLB aims to provide more stable returns during market fluctuations, appealing to conservative investors and those looking to enhance their fixed income allocations. With a competitive expense ratio and the ability to trade throughout the day like a stock, HYLB offers a convenient and efficient way to access the high yield bond market.

products: Invesco S&P High Yield Low Volatility Corporate Bond ETF (HYLB)
